# Contributing Guide

This is a naive template of the contributing guide.

## CLI commands

It's a good idea to use emoji at CLI commands output to make it easier to read. Recommended emojis:

| Emoji  | How to use  |
| ------ | ------------ |
| âŒ  | at error messages  |
| âš ï¸  | at warning messages  |
| âŒ›ï¸  | before starting a time consuming operation  |
| ğŸ’£  | before starting a dangerous operation  |
| ğŸ  | at the successful finish of the command run  |
